description: “For I know the plans I have for you,” declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.” JEREMIAH 29:11. I am a COVID-19 warrior on the frontline and I have been infected with COVID-19. I’ve been educating and posting my experience on my main account (@michael_danila). This is NOT a HOAX. For all of those doing the #filmyourhospital trend, there is a reason why we don’t want to reveal the inside of the hospitals. It is an absolute warzone. A image of hell with God’s angels fighting their hardest to stop the devil from claiming more lives. A sight that we wish no one should ever have to see. So here I am, battling COVID-19 with all of my strength and faith while my brothers and sister fight on the frontlines. My hope is to develop these antibodies that everyone keeps talking about and earn my immunity to the virus. Then I’ll return to helping those who have been SEVERELY affected by the virus with little fear. For now, I will stay home like everyone else should be doing. Stay safe everyone and may God be with you all! This too shall pass 🙏
